title: Start
body:
I am the god of this forest
the banana slug
I have lived for centuries and eons
but the humans have taken my name in vain
made a mockery of me
littered the campus
hurt the wildlife
caused forest fires
and for that they must pay.
defeat the UCSC bosses across the campus for me.
find them.
defeat them. 
and collect the items they drop to create the Sword who Speaks for the Forest.
and use it to defeat the mastermind behind it all...
THE MEAN CHANCELLOR!!
now go, my child. 
be free.
